column1: '''Ants''' are tiny insects that form large communal colonies under the rule of a single queen.
Though unmentioned directly in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
column2: the presence of ants in [[Middle-earth]] may be deduced from the question that [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] put to [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] when they were trying to sleep after the parley at [[Isengard]].  Pippin was restless
column5: "''What's the matter? Are you lying on an ant-hill?''"<ref>{{TT|III11}}</ref>
